Error Location: "/*[local-name()='MD_Metadata' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='identificationInfo' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='MD_DataIdentification' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='resourceConstraints' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'][1]/*[local-name()='MD_LegalConstraints' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']"  Error Assert: "count(gmd:accessConstraints[*/@codeListValue='otherRestrictions']) = 1":
Error Message: "Use constraints shall be provided."  Error Location: "/*[local-name()='MD_Metadata' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='identificationInfo' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='MD_DataIdentification' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']"  Error Assert: "count(gmd:resourceConstraints/*[1]/gmd:useLimitation) >= 1"
